findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function lacks protection, allowing unauthorized access and potential exploitation.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function is not properly protected, allowing unauthorized access and potential asset loss.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious users.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The mint function allows anyone to create new tokens without any restrictions or access control, potentially leading to unauthorized token creation and manipulation of the token supply.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is internal and lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to burn tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The 'swapTokensForDividendToken' and 'swapAndSendYangDividends' functions are private but unprotected, allowing potential unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: The skim function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The sync function is not protected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The initialize function is not protected, allowing anyone to call it and potentially causing unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function is not properly protected, allowing unauthorized access and potential exploitation.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function does not have any access modifiers or restrictions, allowing anyone to call it and potentially drain the allowance.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function is not protected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The _mint function is not protected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized token creation.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The internal _burn function lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to burn tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The _approve function lacks protection, allowing unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected _setupDecimals function
findings.description: The _setupDecimals function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes to the contract's state.

findings.title: Unprotected _beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The _beforeTokenTransfer function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious actors.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawDividend function
findings.description: The withdrawDividend function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized withdrawals.
